# `tabulate()`
The most important function of this package is `tabulate()`: it takes a dataframe and calculates the frequencies or mean 
of columns. The results can be grouped by any other column and also calculated with another subsample. 

```{r}
tabulate(data = iris,cols = Species)
tabulate(data = iris,cols = Sepal.Length, return_mean = TRUE)
```
